p: Four in vitro assays, namely DPPH, ABTS, FRAP, and Î²-carotene bleaching tests, were herein applied to investigate the antioxidant effects of R1 and R2 essential oils. Often natural antioxidants may be multifunctional and may act in vivo through different mechanisms. Therefore, no single technique can completely evaluate the antioxidant potential of a plant extract.
